TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TrackingProfileCache extends System.Object
public ref class TrackingProfileCache abstract sealed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供主机应用程序可用于清除跟踪配置文件缓存的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当工作流运行时引擎有一个或多个向其注册的跟踪服务时，运行时跟踪基础结构必须确定加载到内存中的任何工作流是否存在跟踪配置文件。When the workflow runtime engine has one or more tracking services registered with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure must determine whether tracking profiles exist for any workflow that is loaded into memory. 运行时跟踪基础结构将保留跟踪配置文件缓存，在为工作流向每个跟踪服务请求 之前它将检查该缓存。The runtime tracking infrastructure maintains a cache of tracking profiles which it checks before it requests a for the workflow from each tracking service. 类提供一个静态方法 ，宿主应用程序可以使用该方法来清除跟踪配置文件缓存。The class provides a static method, , which a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache. 这将强制运行时跟踪基础结构在清除了缓存后，为加载到内存中的任何工作流实例，从其注册的跟踪服务中加载跟踪配置文件。This will force the runtime tracking infrastructure to load tracking profiles from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances that are loaded into memory after the cache is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 对于仅限标记的工作流，不支持 缓存。 caching is not supported for markup only workflows.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从运行时跟踪基础结构保留的跟踪配置文件缓存中清除所有跟踪配置文件。

span.span: Clears the tracking profile cache maintained by the runtime tracking infrastructure of all tracking profiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除了缓存后，运行时跟踪基础结构将为加载到内存中的任何工作流实例从其注册的跟踪服务中直接加载跟踪配置文件。After the cache is cleared, the runtime tracking infrastructure will load tracking profiles directly from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances loaded into memory. 除非卸载了工作流并将其重新加载到内存中，否则，处在内存中并且正在运行的任何工作流实例将不需重新加载其跟踪配置文件。Any workflow instance that is in memory and is running will not need to have its tracking profiles reloaded unless the workflow is unloaded and then reloaded into memory.
